uvi.description:
KVM: x86: Handle SRCU initialization failure during page track init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 4664318f73e496cd22c71b10888e75434a123e23. For more details please see the references link.
